name: inadvertence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being not intentional: The policies are designed to cover inadvertence and negligence. I wouldn't ever call anybody a liar in public except through inadvertence. See
inadvertent
More examplesFewer examplesWhen we delay, we do so intentionally and not through inadvertence. Any activity that has some type of inadvertence to it is not conducive to paying attention.It wasn’t a deliberate act of vandalism, but inadvertence and well-intentioned stupidity.
